titleSection.name: VersionOne Integration for ElectricCommander
titleSection.shortDescription: Link agile workitems to tangible, working software in the form of builds.

descriptionSection.description:
As of Spring 2016 this integration was set to sunset status, the source is available below for extending this integration.**

The VersionOne Integration for ElectricCommander creates a record of ElectricCommander builds in VersionOne, so the development teams can quickly view builds associated with a story or defects. This visibility is useful when identifying what build to use for verification or when generating release notes.

mature.shortDescription: The product is stable. The code will continue to evolve with minimum breaking changes.

sapling.shortDescription: The product is undergoing rapid growth. The code works but expect major changes.

seed.shortDescription: The initial idea of a product. May not be stable code.
